Module org.nasdanika.html
Package org.nasdanika.html.impl

Class DefaultHTMLFactory

java.lang.Object
org.nasdanika.html.impl.DefaultHTMLFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
HTMLFactory
public class DefaultHTMLFactory extends Object implements HTMLFactory
HTML factory which relies on Bootstrap styles and scripts.
Author:
Pavel
